PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-08562019-06-19,  ,  ISED,  , 
ActCanadian Tourism Commission Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of La Francophonie of ANDREW TORRIANI of Kirkland, Quebec, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Danielle Poudrette, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
